channel.title: Paypal Problem
channel.description:
Ok i have $15.00 right now on my Paypal Account I am using. And I am trying to buy my own Domain(.com) and its cost $10.00, And I got an error when I try to buy it
[quote="Paypal"]The amount of this transaction exceeds your remaining sending limit and cannot be processed at this time.
* You will need to add and confirm your bank account. Once your bank account has been added and confirmed, you can continue this payment. Add your bank account information below.[/quote]
Can anyone help on how I can use up $10.00 for a domain... And yes I know I need to put a Bank Account on it, but i don't want to, any other ways? Or does anyone know a good site that offers domains that are cheaper then $10.00? Thanks.

item.title: Paypal Problem
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

You need to add your bank account or credit card details, otherwise you cannot purchase a domain.

Read full topic
